messages.message:

hey @Jonathan Shih can you help do a quick patch on this to give a better error message or investigate what’s happening with this particular output
yep looks like it’s an issue with the rotation stuff. will take a look in a sec
apologies, in a meeting at the moment but will fill more in right after — this was done using the defaults in the OCR app, no flow yet
@paul so this happens when the word starts before the bounds of the image (it will be unbounded bounding boxes). putting in a fix for it now
